problem.markdown:
>>An epileptic attack can be induced in a normal person by means of<< ( ) an electric shock ( ) Walking along the road during sunny day ( ) hearing thunder ( ) exposing bright light
>>The EEG signals are originated from the<< ( ) Glia cells ( ) Motor units ( ) Sino atrial node ( ) Acetylcholine
>>The ranges of frequency and voltage related to EEG are<< ( ) 0.5 Hz to 100 Hz and 10 µV to 100 µV ( ) DC to 10 kHz and 10 µV to 1000 µV ( ) 0 to 1000 kHz and 0.1 mV to few mV ( ) 20 Hz to 100 Hz and 0 to few mV
>>A continuous signal analysis over long periods of time can be performed by frequency analysis with the aid of<< ( ) fourier auto correlation ( ) band pass filters ( ) chopper amplifier ( ) memory storage devices
>>Recording of the peripheral nerves action potentials is called<< ( ) Electromyography ( ) Electro corticography ( ) Electro neurography ( ) Electro nervegraphy
